seed_pair.target: Comencé a pensar sobre eso cuidadosamente el mes pasado.
seed_pair.known: I started to think about it carefully last month.

S0027: No me gusta tomar demasiado tiempo para responder.
I don't like taking too much time to answer.
S0028: Es útil comenzar a hablar tan pronto como puedas.
It's useful to start talking as soon as you can.
S0029: Estoy deseando hablar mejor tan pronto como pueda.
I'm looking forward to speaking better as soon as I can.
S0030: I wanted to ask you something yesterday.
S0031: You wanted to speak with me tonight.
S0032: Did you want to show me something?
S0033: How long have you been learning Spanish?
S0034: Él no quiere estar silencioso cuando otras personas están aquí.
He doesn't want to be quiet when other people are here.
S0035: Ella no quiere leer nada esta tarde.
She doesn't want to read anything this afternoon.
S0036: We don't want to interrupt the story.

_instructions.task: Generate 12-15 practice phrases per LEGO using recent seed_pairs as pattern inspiration
_instructions.pattern_matching: Use recent_seed_pairs as full sentence examples showing patterns and vocabulary
_instructions.overgeneration: Generate 12-15 phrases knowing some may be filtered by GATE validation
_instructions.quality: Semantic meaning + syntactic correctness + pedagogical value
_instructions.format: Array format: ["English phrase", "Spanish phrase", null, lego_count]
